title: Rounding
description: Defines rounding rules and precision to be used in the rounding of a number.

roundingDirection.description: Specifies the rounding rounding rule as up, down, or nearest.

precision.description: Specifies the rounding precision in terms of a number of decimal places when the number is evaluated in decimal form (not percentage), e.g. 0.09876543 rounded to the nearest 5 decimal places is  0.0987654.
